sentences.sContent: Abe Marie is a postgraduate student from Berkeley University in the US who has been working with the company as part of her ethnomusicology research.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abe Marie is a postgraduate student from Berkeley University in the US who has been working with the company as part of her ethnomusicology research.
sentences.sCn: 美国柏克莱大学研究生安倍玛利亚，在这个公司上班，也从事人种音乐学的研究。

remMethod.val: ethno(=ethnic人种的) + music(音乐) + ology(学科) → 人种音乐学

trans.tranOther: the study of the music of different cultures
